Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Tag Master Chrome Extension \(Phase 1\)

Features implemented:
- GTM Quick Injector with validation and recent IDs
- DataLayer Monitor with real-time event capture

- Network Monitor for Google requests \(GA4, UA, Ads, Floodlight, GTM\)
- Google Ads Inspector with Enhanced Conversions validation
- Cookie Inspector for Google marketing cookies
- Code Runner for executing JS in page context
- DevTools Panel with full debugging interface
- Side Panel for quick access
- Background service worker with IndexedDB storage
- Session persistence across page reloads

Supported Google products:
- Google Tag Manager \(GTM\)
- Google Analytics 4 \(GA4\)
- Universal Analytics \(UA\)
- Google Ads Conversion Tracking
- Google Ads Remarketing
- Enhanced Conversions
- Floodlight Tags
- DoubleClick

EOF
\)")
